Comment: Contrastive semantics is needed here (Gísli Rúnar Harðarson, p.c)
This word order is dispreferred,possibly IS-triggered (Gísli Rúnar Harðarson, p.c).
Adjectives normally agree with the gender, number and case of the (pro)noun they qualify (Neijmann_2022, p. 243)
RCs are introduced by relative conjunctions, which in Icelandic are sem and, in written and more for-mal language, er (Neijmann_2022, p. 243).
[i]n certain instances, the preposition samkvæmt follows rather than precede its complement (Neijmann_2022, p. 407).
